channel.title: clicZone
channel.description: Information and resources on Clic and JClic, and cooperative development of multimedia educational software project.
channel.dc:creator: clic@xtec.cat

item.title: Parts of the plant
item.description:
These activity works English vocabulary about the parts of the plant. You will find activities to connect, to arrange and audios to practise hearing.

Author: Jose A. Muñoz Romero
Topic: Experimental sciences
Level: Primary school (6-12)
Date: 21/04/17
Comments: new
Language: English

item.title: Canvi d'unitats
item.description:
Package of activities to work unit changes and movement problems. These activities are proposed for secondary level.

Author: Pedro Miguel Gómez
Topic: Mathematics
Level: Secondary school (12-16)
Date: 21/04/17
Comments: new
Language: Catalan

item.title: Comandante Hussi
item.description:
The purpose of these package of activities is literary literacy of 9th grade of primary school (Brazil), from the work Comandante Hussi, Jorge Araújo. There is organized from the methodology for literary reading proposed by Rildo Cosson (2014), entitled "Sequência didática expandida".

Author: Ana Beatriz Albino
Topic: Languages
Level: Secondary school (12-16)
Date: 21/04/17
Comments: new
Language: Portuguese

item.title: Verbes essentiels
item.description:
Package of activities to review essential verbs in French, their conjugations and verbal times. In traduction activities you have audios to exercise hearing.

Author: Paloma Garrido
Topic: Languages
Level: Secondary school (12-16)
Date: 21/04/17
Comments: new
Languages: Spanish, French

item.title: La vaca
item.description:
This project shows the main features of cows: parts of the cow, family of the cow, places where they live, their sound and the products that they gives to us.

Author: Rita Massaguer
Topic: Experimental sciences
Level: Kindergarten (3-6)
Date: 21/04/17
Comments: new
Language: Catalan

item.title: Paisaje y relieve
item.description:
With these package of activities the students will be able to make a review of landscape theme. These activity works separately landscape kinds and relief kinds. These package contains activities to review, to identify and to enjoy.

Author: Francisco José Mora Cruzado
Topic: Experimental sciences
Level: Primary school (6-12)
Date: 21/04/17
Comments: new
Language: Spanish

item.title: Comarca de Ordes
item.description:
Package of activities about Ordes region, province of La Corunna. We will find activities about relief, hydrography, weather, towns and population. There are also activities about Ordes town, where is CEIP Mesón do Vento is located.

Author: Xan Ferreiro Boquete
Topic: Experimental sciences
Level: Primary school (6-12)
Date: 20/04/17
Comments: new
Language: Galician

item.title: Juguemos con las letras
item.description:
Package of activities to practice reading of words and sentences composed by the five vowels and these consonants: d, j, l, m, n, ñ, p, s and t. The package is divided into four blocks with very varied activities for children of 5, 6 and 7 years.

Author: Anne Schuchardt
Topic: Languages
Levels: Kindergarten (3-6), Primary school (6-12)
Date: 20/04/17
Comments: new
Language: Spanish

item.title: Materials
item.description:
Package of activities to work contents about materials: kinds, origin, properties, waste generated and recycling.

Author: Elena Jiménez Martín
Topic: Experimental sciences
Level: Primary school (6-12)
Date: 20/04/17
Comments: new
Language: Catalan

item.title: Ler é divertido
item.description:
Activities to motivate reading based on tales "A que sabe a lúa", "Os oficios de Xan", "A cabana na árbore" and "Otto é un rinoceronte". They work characters and stories according to tale chapters. We can find activities of all kind, from puzzles, associations, letter soups, to text activities.

Author: Carmen Martínez López
Topic: Languages
Levels: Kindergarten (3-6), Primary school (6-12)
Date: 18/04/17
Comments: new
Language: Galician

item.title: La geografia del món
item.description:
Pack of 8 activities to practice and learn aspects about geography of the world, with units of knowledge about reliefs, geographic accidents, rivers and streams, countries and their capitals and flags, natural monuments, landscapes, constructions...

Author: Josep Mª Fortià
Topic: Experimental sciences
Levels: Primary school (6-12), Secondary school (12-16), High school (16-18)
Date: 31/03/17
Comments: new
Language: Catalan

item.title: Animals everywhere
item.description:
Pack of activities that pretends:
  • Identify different animals and body parts of these animals.
  • Describe the appearance of animals.
  • Identify the sound emitted of each animal.
  • Use the verb "to have".

Author: Tina Merino
Topic: Languages
Level: Primary school (6-12)
Date: 30/03/17
Comments: new
Language: English

item.title: Joan Miró - Colors i formes
item.description:
Activities about colours and shapes that dominate the most symbolic works of the artist, that we can find at Joan Miró museum in Barcelona. It also includes an emotional education activity .

Author: Ainara Guil Carmona
Topic: Miscellaneous
Level: Kindergarten (3-6)
Date: 30/03/17
Comments: new
Language: Catalan

item.title: España física
item.description:
Activities about the relief, climate and rivers of Spain, based on the text "Environmental Awareness" - World Water Project. Editorial Alhucemas-Edelvives 6th Primary level.

Author: Antonio González jiménez
Topic: Experimental sciences
Level: Primary school (6-12)
Date: 30/03/17
Comments: new
Language: Spanish

item.title: A biblioteca
item.description:
Pack of activities to understand books organization in a library using UDC (Universal Decimal Classification).

Author: Emilio González Acuña
Topic: Miscellaneous
Level: Secondary school (12-16)
Date: 28/03/17
Comments: new
Language: Galician

item.title: Proves de càlcul mental
item.description:
Is a pack of activities that pretends to work speed in mental calculation of addition, subtraction, multiplication and division algorithms. Each activity has 60 operations and a maximum time to complete of 2 and a half minutes. These operations have been extracted and digitalized from "El Quinzet".

Author: Jordi Santallúsia Plensa
Topic: Mathematics
Level: Primary school (6-12)
Date: 28/03/17
Comments: new
Language: Catalan

item.title: L'època medieval
item.description:
Interdisciplinary project about Middle ages. Activities works different issues like feudal society, constructions or the most common animals. Is addressed to primary education.

Author: Nerea Nicolás Fernández
Topic: Social sciences
Level: Primary school (6-12)
Date: 28/03/17
Comments: new
Language: Catalan

item.title: Animals i animalets
item.description:
Package of activities to learn vocabulary and concepts about animal world. Activities are divided in three blocks, one for each Kindergarten level. Each block is adapted to the contents worked at each level, as well as the difficulty. You will find all kind of activities, from puzzles to text activities.

Author: Esther Escribano García
Topic: Experimental sciences
Level: Kindergarten (3-6)
Date: 28/03/17
Comments: new
Language: Catalan

item.title: Els éssers vius
item.description:
Pack of activities to work living beings classifications and main characteristics; from the first cell to the present.

Author: Albiol Minguell Roquer
Topic: Experimental sciences
Level: High school (16-18)
Date: 28/03/17
Comments: new
Language: Catalan

item.title: Poema "El cargol"
item.description:
Activities of reading and writing to work the poem "El cargol" of Josep Carner.

Authors: Anna Parés Martínez, Eva Sáez and Paula Cardiel
Topic: Languages
Level: Kindergarten (3-6)
Date: 28/03/17
Comments: new
Language: Catalan
